messages.subject: Re: NTHK 2013 West Coast Shinsa Update
messages.msgSnippet: Folks it was a great weekend and a very successful shinsa. I am posting to this forum for a piece of lost and found from the weekend. One of our customers in
messages.messageBody:
Folks it was a great weekend and a very successful shinsa. I am posting to this forum for a piece of lost and found from the weekend. One of our customers in the shinsa room left behind a sword-bag and we fear it may have got packed with someone else's case by mistake. If you were there saturday afternoon and came home with an extra sword-bag do let us know.
I will post a photo of a similar bag in the group galleries�
-t
Thomas C Helm
www.toryu-mon.com
2013 NTHK West Coast Shinsa




On Jul 21, 2013, at 6:30 PM, Tom Helm <toryu@...> wrote:

> Update from the NCJSC To-Ken Taikai - www.ncjsc.org - they have sold out all tables. They have sold out the room block - over 400 room nights! - the hotel has extended our room block, so if you want the show rate now is the time to make your hotel reservation.
> Confirmations for Shinsa registrations have gone out already, so if you are on the fence about coming now is the time to register your swords and make your hotel reservation.
>
> www.toryu-mon.com
>
> Looking forward to seeing you all there,
> -t
> Thomas C Helm
> www.toryu-mon.com
> 2013 NTHK West Coast Shinsa
>
>
>
>

messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] NTHK 2013 West Coast Shinsa Update
messages.msgSnippet: Mea Culpa Mea Culpa! Very sorry to report folks that I misunderstood yesterdays report. We did indeed sell out all tables - we did indeed sell out our block of
messages.messageBody:
Mea Culpa Mea Culpa!
Very sorry to report folks that I misunderstood yesterdays report. We did indeed sell out all tables - we did indeed sell out our block of rooms - the hotel did expand our block to accommodate more of us - HOWEVER the Sword Show rate expired 30 days before the show, so there are no more rooms available at the special rate.
It will still be a great show and well worth it, even if the bargain rate no longer applies�
-t
Thomas C Helm
www.toryu-mon.com
2013 NTHK West Coast Shinsa

messages.subject: NTHK 2013 West Coast Shinsa Update
messages.msgSnippet: Update from the NCJSC To-Ken Taikai - www.ncjsc.org -  they have sold out all tables. They have sold out the room block - over 400 room nights! - the hotel has
messages.messageBody:
Update from the NCJSC To-Ken Taikai - www.ncjsc.org - they have sold out all tables. They have sold out the room block - over 400 room nights! - the hotel has extended our room block, so if you want the show rate now is the time to make your hotel reservation.
Confirmations for Shinsa registrations have gone out already, so if you are on the fence about coming now is the time to register your swords and make your hotel reservation.

www.toryu-mon.com

Looking forward to seeing you all there,
-t
Thomas C Helm
www.toryu-mon.com
2013 NTHK West Coast Shinsa
